Summary Note:
The RM first met Friis Nørregaard Haugaard at a luxury car show in Copenhagen. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Friis Nørregaard Haugaard is a seasoned professional with over 25 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Friis Nørregaard Haugaard is married to Camilla. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Friis received his secondary school diploma from Birkerød Gymnasium in 1995.
Friis completed his university studies at Technical University of Denmark (DTU) in 2000.
He also pursued further higher education at Copenhagen Business School, graduating in 2004.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 25 years, Friis Nørregaard Haugaard has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Friis Nørregaard Haugaard began his professional journey as a Software Developer at SAP Danmark A/S in 2000, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Startup Founder at SAP Danmark A/S, where he continued to grow professionally from 2005 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 2570000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has flat located in Horsens, worth 900000 DKK.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns house in Hillerød worth 1960000 DKK.

On top of that he inherited a beautiful villa in Sønderborg, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 2730000 DKK.
In 2010, he received an inheritance of 7800000 DKK from his late mother, who was a prominent Venture Capitalist, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Friis has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
